main event: Bert Pickett, a resident of Castlewood, Virginia, sighted an elongated, brightly lit unidentified flying object on July 6, 1969.
interesting points: The object was reported as having a pointed front with circular or elliptical formations around it,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The weather conditions during the sighting were clear with good visibility, The sighting was documented as part of Project Blue Book,The witness contacted local authorities to report the sighting.
sighted object: an elongated, brightly lit object with circular formations
witness description: Bert Pickett, a resident of Castlewood, Virginia
